title: Age, Politics and Conditional Distributions
question_text: Researchers wanted to investigate how an individual's age relates to his or her political leanings.  A random sample of $100$ individuals in each of three age categories was asked to classify themselves as being "Liberal" or "Conservative".  The results are displayed in the side-by-side bar graph below. Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2016. All rights reserved. Based on this display, what is the conditional distribution of Liberals by age category?

choices.text: There is no way to determine the conditional distribution from the graph provided.
